name: extended unseen mandala
notes:
> a free version of this pattern is
> available on my website in three parts. the paid-for version
> includes written instructions, charts, and lots of photos to help you along the way.

this is an extended version of the [unseen mandala][1] i designed three years ago.  the words i spoke then ring just as true now:

"during these last few months, i have thought a lot about the hidden (unseen) things people go through; some of them temporary, and some of them life-long battles.  

regardless of the extent/seriousness/duration, hidden things carry a burden very different from that of visible things.  and if they are hidden even from ourselves, whether that is simply because we donâ€™t have names for them yet, or because we do not want to acknowledge them, that burden becomes even heavier.

i designed this mandala to acknowledge the hidden and unseen, both in others and in ourselves."

**details**

this mandala is a 51-round mandala, designed to be stretched on a 85cm/33.5" hoop and used as a wall hanging.  

the pattern contains bobble stitches, popcorn stitches, puff stitches, front post/back post stitches, and pineapple stitches.

although it is an intermediate pattern, it has been written for adventurous beginners, with plenty of photos and hints.

enjoy!

dedri
